Apartment with a lot of light, one of the rooms is a passageway that can be either a dressing room or an office, hence the T2+1, Portuguese wood flooring, kitchen equipped with fridge (Booch combo) and stove and water heater, laundry area and a very nice balcony. Excellent location close to El Corte Inglés and Imaviz It can be visited from the 15th of December.

2 bedroom apartment, completely renovated, with 92.7 m2.It also has an outdoor area at the back and laundry, which total an additional 12 m2. The entrance to the apartment is done independently at the RC level through doors n.84 and 84A.The living room (22.4 m2) communicates with a semi-equipped Kitchenette (9.05 m2). It has a suite with bathroom with bathtub and a bedroom with closet area.There is a full social bathroom (with shower) and through the second bedroom (10.5 m2 + closet 4.3 m2) we have access to an interior terrace (6.45 m2), the laundry room (5.2 m2) and the a storage area (12 m2). The building has undergone interventions over the years so it is in good condition.It is located in the heart of the Madragoa neighborhood, considered one of the most popular and oldest neighborhoods in Lisbon, and winner of the Lisbon Popular Marches several times.Genuine and picturesque area with a Lisbon neighborhood atmosphere, Portuguese cobblestone streets and restricted access to residents. The location, very central, gives access to all types of transport and next to the future Santos Metro station (scheduled for 2022).It is also very close to traditional shops, Universities (ISEG and IADE) and a few minutes from Jardim da Assembleia da República and Jardim da Estrela. Team + Sharing Remax Team AMI13010 122911278-175.

EXCELLENT T2 NEW IN MALVAROSA! Magnificent apartment to debut, characterized by the superior quality of construction and finishes, the generous areas of all divisions and the excellent location, and also by a large outdoor space with barbecue. The apartment is composed of: • fully equipped kitchen – induction hob, oven, microwave, coffee makers washing machine and dishwasher, fridge, freezer and LCD screen • large living room, adjacent to the kitchen and terrace • 2 bedrooms with more than 17 m² and large built-in wardrobes, one of which is a suite • 2 bathrooms, one common and one in one of the bedrooms • balcony in the suite overlooking the river • terrace with barbecue • box for one vehicle and lots of additional space • collection Equipment and amenities include: • ducted air conditioning, independently adjustable in each room • water heating by solar panels • double glazed windows and thermal break • electric blinds, with centralized command • built-in led lighting in all divisions • central aspiration • high security door • video intercom The urbanization of Malvarosa is a modern and harmonious residential neighbourhood, served by multiple commercial and service establishments, including some renowned restaurants, close to large commercial areas and with almost direct access to the A1, free of tolls to Lisbon. For those who prefer public transport, the CP station in Alverca is just 1.5 km from the apartment, has large areas of free parking and the journey to Oriente station takes less than 20 minutes. REQUIREMENTS FOR AGREEMENT: • PREVIOUS ANALYSIS OF FINANCIAL ELEMENTS OF LESSEE(S) AND FIADFOR(ES) • PAYMENT OF 2 RENT (initial and deposit) AND 5,000 € AS A GUARANTEE (subject to refund under the terms of the end of contract clause) Contact us for more detailed information and/or to schedule your visit.

elementList.description: 3 bedroom apartment with two bathrooms, located on the 2nd floor, with a balcony in a building without an elevator. Located in Estrela, more precisely on Rua Doutor Teófilo Braga, next to Calçada da Estrela, for sale or long-term lease. This apartment underwent renovations around 6 years ago, having been changed from a T2 to a T3 and a bathroom was added, leaving one en suite and one for common use. The apartment has air conditioning, dishwasher, washing machine, fitted wardrobes and electric shutters. The Parish of Estrela welcomes those who visit it, allowing a unique journey through a very rich Heritage that mirrors a Parish full of identity. With quality green spaces, such as Jardim da Estrela and Tapada das Necessidades; typical restaurants, taverns and simultaneously a fusion gastronomic offer; and cultural references such as the National Museum of Ancient Art, the Museum of the East, the Convent of Bernardas, with the Puppet Museum, the Convent of S.Francisco de Paula, the Basílica da Estrela, the Chafariz da Esperança and the Historic District of Madragoa, one of the most emblematic neighborhoods in the City of Lisbon. User License nº 52 issued by CML in . Private Gross Area: 80m2 + 4m2 of dependent gross area Useful Area: 70m2 Rental conditions: 2 rents + 1 deposit Valid documents and guarantor if necessary Contact Homing Group for more information! We have a vast team ready to accompany the process and answer any questions that may be necessary in the purchase, sale or lease. The Homing Group is a company focused on excellent customer service since 2016 in Lisbon, Porto and the Algarve, based on three pillars: Serve the customer, take care of the consultant and respect the partners! We share 50%-50% with all professionals in the sector!

Exclusive Kw - Apartment in Ericeira, 15min walk from the center and the beach, furnished and with garage   It has three bedrooms, one en suite with a bathroom. Spacious lounge with balcony, fully equipped kitchen with balcony. It has another bathroom and a good entrance hall.   It is furnished and equipped.   Electrical heating.   About Ericeira: Traditional fishing village, Ericeira developed a lot during the 19th century. XX due to the growing demand as a summer resort, while maintaining its original characteristics and a very own atmosphere.   Located about 50 km from Lisbon, in an easily accessible area, its beaches are very popular during the summer, being considered one of the best in Europe for surfing. A special highlight deserves the Ribeira d`Ilhas Beach, where one of the events of the World Surfing Championship is held annually. Ericeira and its beaches are, since 2011, a World Surfing Reserve.   A stroll through Ericeira is also an excellent opportunity to taste the varied dishes of seafood and fresh fish, a gastronomic specialty of the region.
elementList.highlightComment: Apartment in Ericeira, near center, furnished, sea view. Can be rented between 6 and 9 months

elementList.description: The Palazzo is a fully furnished, recently refurbished apartment with 3 independent bedrooms - 2 double with king size beds and 1 single room with single bed - with a bright living room, large kitchen, a ceiling height of 3.20m and a full bathroom. The apartment is fully furnished and equipped (beds, sofa, tables, chairs, wardrobes, washing machine and dishwasher, combined refrigerator, stove with oven, microwave and plasma tv) and is ready to move into. Situated a 10-minute walk from the Tagus and a 5-minute walk from Ajuda Palace, it is located in a quiet area, next to Calçada da Ajuda and Belém, with all transport (buses and trams) and access to: - Ajuda University Campus / University of Lisbon Campus (Veterinary, Architecture, Social Sciences and Politics) - ISA (Higher Institute of Agronomy) - Lusíada (Junqueira). - StartUps LX Factory Incubation Center - Baixa Lisboeta The area is rich in local commerce (supermarkets, pharmacies, cafes, hairdressers, banks.. . ) and adjacent to the Jeronimos Monastery, Pastéis de Belém, Botanical Garden, Coach Museum and MAAT. Come live next to the Tagus River, Belém, the museums and the center of Lisbon. To schedule your visit to the apartment send message via Idealist platform including: - Entry date - Time of stay (Minimum stay of 6 months) - Occupation: student or professional For consideration: - Ideally 1 person per room. The possibility of 2 people in double rooms to be discussed with the owner (regarding rent and bills) - We are looking for tenants who cherish the newly renovated home and consider "late night noise" to respect the building's neighbors - We are looking for non-smoking tenants. Price mentioned excludes bills (water, electricity, gas, tv & internet).

Great T2 for rent with 122m2 of floor space, plenty of light, 2 bathrooms, 2 open balconies, 1 unreserved parking space. All divisions underwent renovations 2 years ago with excellent materials. Noble and privileged location, wooded where you can breathe fresh air, nearby shops (Pingo Doce 300m), Estoril-Praia Stadium (500m), 1.5km from Estoril Casino and Tamariz Beach. Good apartment for those who want to live peacefully with all the comfort in one of the noblest areas of Cascais Book a visit now to see this dream home.

3 bedroom apartment in Alto dos Lombos In ALTO DOS LOMBOS (Rua dos Cravos) we find this 1st floor renovated in a semi-detached house (autonomous fraction). The apartment has a large living room, 3 bedrooms, kitchen with adjoining closed balcony, pantry, 1 bathroom and 1 shared WC. Built-in wardrobes in the hallway and in 2 of the bedrooms. The apartment will be equipped with an electric stove and oven, washing machine, fridge and electric water heater. You can also enjoy the private garden areas and a box garage for 1 car. Close to Feira de Carcavelos, Carcavelos Train Station, Commerce, Services, Banks, Pharmacy, the Nova School of Business & Economics and the beaches of Carcavelos and Parede,   Conditions: 3 year contract Two advanced rents, a deposit and guarantor. 2 advance payments + 1 deposit of €2,000 guarantors are required   User License No. 326 of CMC.

English speaking calls and visits. Brand new apartment, not furnished, 3 bedrooms, in the center of Carnaxide, with 100 m2, balcony, 2 elevators, open views, 3 fronts facing the Sun, East, South and West. Buses at the door, next to the health center of Carnaxide and Solátia shopping center, supermarkets, restaurants. 5 minutes from the new World Trade Center in Carnaxide. 2 full bathrooms with windows. LED lighting crown molding throughout the house. Built-in spotlights, ceiling lamps. 3 large wardrobes with drawers. Countless shots. Kitchen equipped with extractor hood, 100 liters water heater, stove, ceramic hob, washing machine, dishwasher. Top-of-the-range white window frames with thermal break, swing-stops. En-suite bathroom in one of the bedrooms. Openspace living room with kitchen. Without furniture. The 3D images are just a decoration suggestion. User license 201 CMO. Building from 1988, apartment renovated in 2022. Free car park 30 meters away. Parking at the door, with an annual fee of six euros for residents. Huge garden behind the building. Conditions: 2 months of deposit, 2 months of rent, 3 last renters' payslips, 2021 renters' tax return. guarantors. Certificate of residence in Portugal if foreigners. Employment contract. Minimum lease term of 1 year. Pets are not allowed in the apartment. I do not pay commissions to intermediaries. (lights are all white).

elementList.description: Availability for immediate entry. The apartment is part of a building located in the North of the Parque das Nações. The area is characterized by being markedly residential, with the tranquility of the surrounding near the Tagus River and with all the potential that the outdoor spaces offer for the most diverse moments of leisure outdoors.  A wide variety of commerce and services such as pharmacies, banking institutions, supermarkets, pastry shops, hairdressers, schools, among others, and public transport are at your entire disposal. The property, typology T2, is very bright, is furnished and has river views in all rooms. It consists of 2 bedrooms, both with built-in wardrobe, and has 1 bathroom with bathtub. The kitchen is fully equipped, including dishes, cutlery and small appliances, as well as washing area.  It also enjoys central heating and has associated 1 parking space. At least the following rental conditions are required: - Contract: 1 renewable year  - Security deposit: 1 month of income - Initial rent payment: 3 months Do you want more information and/or schedule your visit? Don't miss this opportunity. Contact us now!

2 bedroom apartment in a quiet area, fully furnished, very well decorated, every detail of the property has touches of refinement that mix contemporary pieces with antique pieces that result in a space of great taste: - Starting with a large entrance hall. - Living room with two environments, dining and living room, with a full-length balcony for an unobstructed and wooded view. - It has a kitchen with generous space and fully equipped. - A large bedroom with open and wooded views, with space for study/work (home office) and built-in wardrobe. - The second bedroom also has a front porch with an open and wooded view. - Two bathrooms, one with a bathtub. - Support closet for both bedrooms. All very well distributed in 122m2. - Garage with internal access via elevators. - Piped gas water heating with inspection done less than 1 month ago. 1 year contract, renewable for the same period.
